page.title: 16 Changes in Killingworth
page.content: Many new flats, houses ,factories and shops have been built in Killingworth. Killingworth is a favourite shopping place, and lots of people go there regularly to buy things because they find it cheaper there than anywhere else. I go to the library, the Sports Centre, Swimming Baths and to the lake to look at the swans. Most elderly people I know say that Killingworth New Town is a change for the better, and so do I. Sandra Black A long time ago Killingworth was a village. The pond and nearby fields were full of wild life, geese, ducks, birds and lots of rabbits. Killingworth has changed from a quiet country village into a busy town. Mark Szliszka
